titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding support for the inclusion of salaries of Members of Congress in any proposed across-the-board reduction in fiscal year 2000 funding for Federal agencies.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 10/25/1999--Introduced. Declares that any across-the-board funding reduction for agencies in FY 2000 should also include the same reduction for salaries of Members of Congress.
